channel.title: minimal computing on Steven's Snippets
channel.description: Recent content in minimal computing on Steven's Snippets

item.title: Going live
item.description: Here we are, a brand new blog. Some old content, some new content planned. After a year of using LinkedIn for blogging, I have decided I want to take it one step further and bundle some more stuff on here. This has various reasons: I get to keep better control over where my content ends up - if LinkedIn changes its business model, that’s not on me. I do believe that a fragmented internet with easily accessible and searchable content is what the internet should be.
